row.entry: Top left pile. The rest of the deck is placed here after dealing the Tableau. Cards are automatically placed on to the Tableau whenever a space opens up.
Ten piles. Deal a card face up in every pile.

sect2.title: Regras
sect2.para: Remove cards in pairs that add up to thirteen with Aces being one, Jacks being eleven, and Queens being twelve. Kings are removed singly.
Empty Tableau piles are automatically filled from the Stock.

sect2.title: Pontuação
sect2.para: Você marca um ponto do cada carta removida.

sect2.title: Estratégia
sect2.para: Go as fast as you can.
